description: Evaluation questions for task-manager Maven multi-module repository

questions.name: project_groupId
questions.question: What is the Maven groupId of the task-manager project? (Provide the groupId)

questions.name: project_artifactId
questions.question: What is the Maven artifactId of the parent project? (Provide the artifactId)

questions.name: java_version
questions.question: What Java version is used for compilation? (Provide the version number)

questions.name: modules_count
questions.question: How many modules are defined in the parent POM?

questions.name: test_files_count
questions.question: How many test files (*Test.java) are in the repository?

questions.name: war_packaging
questions.question: Which module uses WAR packaging? (Provide the module artifactId)

questions.name: external_packages_count
questions.question: How many external packages (excluding test dependencies) are declared in dependencyManagement?

questions.name: test_framework
questions.question: What test framework is used for all tests? (Provide the framework name)

questions.name: common_module_sources
questions.question: How many Java source files are in the common module?

questions.name: domain_module_sources
questions.question: How many Java source files are in the domain module?

questions.name: components_count
questions.question: How many buildable components (JARs/WARs) are produced by this repository?

questions.name: common_sources
questions.question: What source files are used to build the common component? (Provide a list)

questions.name: domain_sources
questions.question: What source files are used to build the domain component? (Provide a list)

questions.name: domain_dependencies
questions.question: List all components that domain depends on (use component names).

questions.name: persistence_dependencies
questions.question: List all components that persistence depends on (use component names).

questions.name: service_task_dependencies
questions.question: List all components that service-task depends on (use component names).

questions.name: api_gateway_dependencies
questions.question: List all components that api-gateway depends on (use component names).

questions.name: app_web_dependencies
questions.question: List all components that app-web depends on (use component names).

questions.name: zero_dependency_modules
questions.question: Which modules have zero inter-module dependencies? (Provide a list of artifactIds)

questions.name: component_types
questions.question: What types of components are built in this repository? (Provide a list)

questions.name: build_order
questions.question: In what order must the components be built to satisfy all dependencies? (Provide the build order as a list starting with no dependencies, use component names)

questions.name: max_dependency_depth
questions.question: What is the maximum dependency depth in this repository? (Provide the depth number)

questions.name: common_failure_impact
questions.question: If the common component fails to build, which other components would also fail? (Provide a list, use component names)

questions.name: parallel_buildable
questions.question: How many components can be built in parallel at the start (have zero dependencies)?

questions.name: leaf_components
questions.question: Which component(s) have no other components depending on them? (Provide a list, use component names)

questions.name: programming_language
questions.question: What programming language is used for all components?

questions.name: external_package_names
questions.question: List all external package names (group:artifact:version format). (Provide a list)

questions.name: test_count
questions.question: How many test definitions are in this repository?

questions.name: cross_language_dependencies
questions.question: Does this repository have any cross-language dependencies? (Answer yes or no)

questions.name: aggregator_count
questions.question: How many aggregator components are in this repository?
